block.p: MAJOR LEAGUE BASEBALL--Suspended Yankees C Jorge Posada and Tampa Bay Devil Rays INF Bobby Smith for one game and fined each an undisclosed amount for fighting and causing a bench-clearing incident during a game on July 1 and Anaheim Angels RHP Tim Belcher for three games and fined him an undisclosed amount for arguing excessively and causing physical contact with an umpire during a game against the Seattle Mariners on June 27.

MAJOR LEAGUE BASEBALL--Suspended Yankees C Jorge Posada and Tampa Bay Devil Rays INF Bobby Smith for one game and fined each an undisclosed amount for fighting and causing a bench-clearing incident during a game on July 1 and Anaheim Angels RHP Tim Belcher for three games and fined him an undisclosed amount for arguing excessively and causing physical contact with an umpire during a game against the Seattle Mariners on June 27.

American League YANKEES--Sent LHP Ed Yarnall to Columbus of the International League. Recalled RHP Darrell Einertson from Columbus. BOSTON RED SOX--Assigned OF Curtis Pride to Pawtucket of the International League. Sent LHP Tim Young to Pawtucket. Called up 1B Dernell Stenson from Pawtucket. MINNESOTA TWINS--Recalled OF Chad Allen from Salt Lake City of the PCL. Sent OF Butch Huskey to Salt Lake City. SEATTLE MARINERS--Activated RHP Freddy Garcia from the 15-day disabled list. Placed RHP Frankie Rodriguez on the 15-day disabled list, retroactive to July 1. TEXAS RANGERS--Agreed to terms with C Scott Heard.

National League ARIZONA DIAMONDBACKS--Purchased the contract of OF Rob Ryan from Tucson of the PCL. Optioned RHP Geraldo Guzman to El Paso of the Texas League. CINCINNATI REDS--Placed RHP Osvaldo Fernandez on the 15-day disabled list. Recalled RHP Scott Winchester from Louisville of the International League. Claimed RHP Jason Sekany off waivers from the Boston Red Sox and optioned him to Chattanooga of the Southern League. PITTSBURGH PIRATES--Optioned LHP Jimmy Anderson to Altoona of the Eastern League. Called up OF Chad Hermansen from Nashville of the PCL. SAN DIEGO PADRES--Optioned RHP Will Cunnane to Las Vegas of the PCL.

BASKETBALL National Basketball Association NBA--Fined the Dallas Mavericks and the Milwaukee Bucks $50,000 each for violating league rules governing tryouts of prospective draftees. LOS ANGELES CLIPPERS--Waived G Charles Jones.

FOOTBALL National Football League MIAMI DOLPHINS--Signed G Antonio Fleming. Waived WR Todd Doxzon, G Joe Wong, FB Teddy Salters. PITTSBURGH STEELERS--Signed WR Danny Farmer and LB Clark Haggans. ST. LOUIS RAMS--Signed DE Brian Young, S Matt Bowen and G Andrew Kline to three-year contracts. SAN FRANCISCO 49ERS--Signed DB Kelly Herndon. TENNESSEE TITANS--Agreed to terms with S Bobby Myers. WASHIGNTON REDSKINS--Agreed to terms with with TE Irv Smith and CB Lloyd Harrison. Released K Pete Elezovic, TE Kevin Pesak, and CB Ian McIntosh.

HOCKEY National Hockey League COLUMBUS BLUE JACKETS--Signed D Frantisek Kucera to a multiyear contract. MINNESOTA WILD--Signed LW Peter Bartos. MONTREAL CANADIENS--Agreed to terms with C Saku Koivu and F Eric Landry. Signed LW Patrick Poulin to a three-year contract and D Enrico Ciccone, C P.J. Stock, D Sylvain Blouin and LW Eric Bertrand. NASHVILLE PREDATORS--Signed LW Petr Sachl and D Timo Helbling. PHILADELPHIA FLYERS--Signed LW Kevin Stevens to a one-year contract. PHOENIX COYOTES--Signed F Landon Wilson to a one-year contract. TAMPA BAY LIGHTNING--Named John Tortorella associate coach. WASHINGTON CAPITALS--Signed LW Craig Berube to a one-year contract and D Sylvain Cote to a three-year contract.

COLLEGE AUBURN--Promoted Kellie Harper to women's third assistant basketball coach and Lauretta Freeman to women's second assistant basketball coach. CENTRAL CONNECTICUT STATE--Named Linda Sagnelli women's volleyball coach and Alan Leathers men's and women's tennis coach. COLGATE--Named James Parker assistant swimming coach. KINGS POINT--Named Tony Soika director of physical fitness training and recreation. MICHIGAN--Announced senior basketball F Brandon Smith and sophomore F Leland Anderson are leaving the school. MONMOUTH, N.J.--Named Chris Ostrowsky assistant football coach. SETON HALL--Announced the suspension of the men's varsity tennis program. TENNESSEE--Announced basketball F Tasheika Morris has transferred to Florida State.
